snippet: Shares fell for a third consecutive day as investors worried that the Federal Reserve would end its bond-buying program as early as September.
abstract: Stocks lose ground for third straight day as investors show increasing concern about when Federal Reserve might start to wind down economic stimulus program.
lead_paragraph: Shares fell for a third consecutive day as investors worried that the Federal Reserve would end its bond-buying program as early as September.

headline.main: Fear of End to Stimulus Daunts Market
headline.print_headline: Fear of End to Stimulus Daunts Market
